<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Erinys (Fury Devil)](/Monsters.aspx?ID=111)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Erinyes exact vengeance and bloody justice for a creature’s crimes, torturing and punishing their victims in ironic fashion before allowing them the escape of death. While an erinys appears as a fallen angel and the first erinyes shared that origin, erinyes now originate in myriad ways, some promoted from lesser devils and others shaped from lemures themselves forged from the souls of torturers and persecutors. The erinyes’ origin is entwined with Eiseth, herself a fallen angel and one of Hell’s most powerful demigods. The first erinyes were all considered to be Eiseth’s metaphorical daughters, but erinyes formed since that time are no longer limited to a single gender.

<title level="2" right="Creature 8">[Erinys](/Monsters.aspx?ID=111)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="LE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Devil" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=44" />
<trait label="Fiend" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=70" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 89</row>

**Perception** +18; greater darkvision, [_true seeing_](/Spells.aspx?ID=344)

**Languages**
[Celestial](/Languages.aspx?ID=16), [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Draconic](/Languages.aspx?ID=2), [Infernal](/Languages.aspx?ID=19); telepathy 100 feet

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +17, [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) +14, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +19, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +15, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +19, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +16, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +17

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +5

**Dex** +5

**Con** +5

**Int** +2

**Wis** +4

**Cha** +5
</row>

**Items**
[Breastplate](/Armor.aspx?ID=10), [100 feet of erinys-hair rope](/Equipment.aspx?ID=44), _+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [composite longbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=74)_ (60 arrows)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 27 

**Fort** +17 

**Ref** +19 

**Will** +16 

+1 status to all saves vs. magic
</row>

**HP** 120

**Immunities**
[fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72)

**Resistances**
physical 5 (except [silver](/Equipment.aspx?ID=379)), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126) 10

**Weaknesses**
good 5

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet, fly 40 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_flaming longsword_ +19 ([Evil](/Traits.aspx?ID=64), [Fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [versatile P](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d8+8 slashing plus 1d6 evil and 1d6 fire

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_flaming composite longbow_ +20 ([deadly 1d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [Evil](/Traits.aspx?ID=64), [Fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [range increment 100 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 0](/Traits.aspx?ID=254), [volley 30 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=201)),
**Damage** 2d8+4 piercing plus 1d6 evil and 1d6 fire

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
rope +19 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [range increment 30 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248)),
**Damage** rope snare

**Divine Innate Spells** DC 26
- **2nd**
[Illusory Object](/Spells.aspx?ID=160), [Illusory Disguise](/Spells.aspx?ID=159) (at will)
- **3rd**
[Fear](/Spells.aspx?ID=110) (at will)
- **4th**
[Dimension Door](/Spells.aspx?ID=69) (at will), [Divine Wrath](/Spells.aspx?ID=86), [Retributive Pain](/Spells.aspx?ID=447)
- **5th**
[Dimension Door](/Spells.aspx?ID=69)
- **Constant (6th)**
[True Seeing](/Spells.aspx?ID=344)

**Rituals** DC 26

- **1st**
[Infernal Pact](/Rituals.aspx?ID=23)

**Flames of Fury**   Any weapon an erinys holds gains the effects of a [_flaming_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=295) rune while they hold it.

**Furious Fusillade** <actions string="Three Actions" />  The erinys hovers in place if they are flying and fires one arrow at any number of creatures in a 30-foot cone. Each attack is rolled separately. This counts as one attack for the purpose of the erinys's multiple attack penalty.

**Rope Snare**   An erinys carries a coil of rope woven of their hair (use the statistics for rope) that animates in their hands. When a creature is hit by the erinys’s rope, a segment of the rope tears loose and wraps itself around the creature, imposing a 10–foot circumstance penalty to Speed. The piece that tears off is 10 feet long for a Medium or smaller creature, and doubles in length for each size larger than Medium. When a creature Escapes the effect (DC 26), the detached segment of rope withers away into useless black sludge.

</column>
